refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new VLAN on all hosts in a pool.

refsect1.title: PREREQUISITES
refsect1.para: xe pool-vlan-create requires an internal network and one physical PIF device.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para:
xe pool-vlan-create creates a VLAN on all hosts in a pool and assigns it to the specified network. A pseudo PIF is created and associated with the specified physical PIF. VLAN tagging occurs on the pseudo PIF. The resulting VLAN UUID is returned.
Physical PIF supports 802.1Q
